attributes.review: This app KILLED my pet hippo and hospitalized my grandpa. The images in this app have no trigger warning. The gross images in this app are so vital they gave my grandpa a STROKE. My pet hippo picked the phone up, and threw it after seeing what appeared to be a Cheeto-in-chief dancing on a unicorn. Since there as no warning, my hippo ran into traffic. My grandma said she likes the app, so my family has to lock her in a cage until Thanksgiving. This app is so scary I have had nightmares since November 2016. Please! Do not download.
attributes.title: Would rate zero stars if I could

attributes.review: Oh, if only negative stars were an option! I should have guessed that this blundering, incompetent administration would publish a worthless app. BabyDonnie is the poster child of failing forward. The imbecile in chief inherited millions and has 6 bankruptcies (not to mention the open racism, misogyny, and alleged sexual misconduct). The administration has multiple allegations of financial misconduct. It only stands to reason that this app is plausibly another attempt to funnel money into the family coffers. Do not download this app. Stand against corruption and tyranny!
